docstring.long_description:
Requires an OPEN SERIAL block at the start of the app to connect with
the instrument.
docstring.short_description: Chose the trigger source and slope for a 33120A function generator.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires a OPEN SERIAL node).

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The source to use for triggering.

parameters.name: slope
parameters.description: Trigger on positive or negative slopes.

returns.description: String: Summary of waveform generator settings.
